Jenny did not understand when the word was repeated back to her in this way
voiced alveolar plosive replaced by voiceless bilabial plosive;
initial cluster replaced by voiceless bilabial plosive; voiceless alveolar plosive replaced by voiceless bilabial plosive;

CHAT.comment: 1. At this stage , Jane does not understand questions like ìWhere did you put it?î with falling or rising intonation. She will imitate the final words , for example "put it". She does not appear to understand WH questions or intonation. 2.The difference between voiced and voiceless plosives is mainly aspiration of the voiceless plosives. 3. Colour names are used indiscriminately e.g. blue , red , pink , yellow. 4. New situations need to be carefully watched as they provoke ìcreativeî concatenations of syntax.
